verses.verse: And <WG2532> the whole <WG537> multitude <WG4128> of them <WG846> arose <WG450>, and led <WG71> him <WG846> unto <WG1909> Pilate <WG4091>.

And <WG1161> when Herod <WG2264> saw <WG1492> Jesus <WG2424>, he was exceeding <WG3029> glad <WG5463>: for <WG1063> he was <WG2258> desirous <WG2309> to see <WG1492> him <WG846> of <WG1537> a long <WG2425> season, because <WG1223> he had heard <WG191> many things <WG4183> of <WG4012> him <WG846>; and <WG2532> he hoped <WG1679> to have seen <WG1492> some <WG5100> miracle <WG4592> done <WG1096> by <WG5259> him <WG846>.
